name: BOE Partners
features: Secure user registration and login system using bcrypt for password hashing.
User profiles with personalized data and customizable avatars stored in MongoDB
JWT used for authorization and session management.
Full CRUD app, including ability to like each school and store in favorites
about: Filter and register to schools, view upcoming events, read blogs, and access exclusive content. User registration system is integrated, employing bcrypt for password hashing. Registered users can customize their profiles and like schools. Implements session management, authentication, and authorization.

name: Medications Tracker
features: Secure user registration and login system employing bcrypt for password hashing
JWT-based authentication and authorization ensuring secure user sessions
User profile management feature allowing avatar changes and account info editing
Comprehensive medication tracking system allowing for addition, update, and soft deletion of medication records
about: It features secure registration and login, facilitated by bcrypt hashing and JWT for session management. User-friendly interface for medication management, history tracking, and profile customization, including avatar changes. Deployed on AWS with EC2 and S3

name: AI Therapy
features: User-friendly interface that simulates a real human therapist.
Integration with ChatGPT API to provide AI-driven conversation.
Built in react with a NodeJS backend and deployed on GCP.
AI generated images using prompt engineering.
about: Simulates a real human therapist using the ChatGPT API. Provides a user-friendly interface and personalized experiences for users. Deployed on GCP, the app is built in React with a NodeJS backend. The app also features AI-generated images using prompt engineering.

name: Tasks Manager
features: Full CRUD operations for task management.
User registration and login system.
Authentication and authorization for enhanced security.
about: Full-stack application that allows users to manage their tasks effectively. The application supports full CRUD operations, enabling users to create, read, update, and delete tasks. It also features a user registration and login system, along with authentication and authorization mechanisms for enhanced security. The application is built using React, AntDesign, Firebase, NodeJS, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Express, and GCP.

name: Musician Portfolio
features: Responsive design that ensures the website looks good on all devices.
Smooth navigation for a user-friendly experience.
Showcase of the musician's work, including pictures and videos
Contact form for easy communication.
about: The Musician Portfolio is a visually appealing website developed using HTML5 and CSS3. It is designed to leave a lasting impression on visitors and showcase the work of a bass player. The website features a responsive design, ensuring it looks good on all devices. It also includes smooth navigation, a showcase of the musician's work, including audio clips and videos, and a contact form for easy communication.

name: Live Clock
features: Real-time clock that dynamically fetches and displays the current time.
Beautifully designed interface that is both visually appealing and user-friendly.
Responsive design ensuring the website looks good on all devices.
about: Live Clock is a beautifully designed website created using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. It features a real-time clock that dynamically fetches and displays the current time. The interface is visually appealing and user-friendly, with a responsive design that ensures the website looks good on all devices.

name: Quiz App
features: Interactive quizzes or exams with instant feedback.
Data fetched from a JSON file for dynamic quiz generation.
Use of React Hooks for state management and side effects.
Responsive design ensuring the app looks good on all devices.
about: The Quiz App is an interactive application that simulates a quiz and provides instant feedback to the user. It is built using React Hooks, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Bootstrap. The application fetches data from a JSON file to generate dynamic quizzes, providing a unique experience for each user. It also features a responsive design, ensuring the app looks good on all devices.

name: Wine Catalog
features: Interactive catalog of wines fetched from an external API.
User-friendly interface for easy navigation and exploration of wines.
Responsive design ensuring the app looks good on all devices.
about: The Wine Catalog is a React application that emulates a wine catalog, fetching and presenting data from an external API. The application provides a user-friendly interface for easy navigation and exploration of a wide variety of wines. It also features a responsive design, ensuring the app looks good on all devices.
